title: 'The Best
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars'
column5: I ordered them again for the sake of piling up more :) . I ordered a pack last time about an year ago. Honestly, it replaced all my pens and wooden pencils. The 1 mechanical pencil I used last year is still working without any damages. I still have 4 more from the last pack. Believe me, if you haven't bought one, u need to get it, it will save you a lot of money, and the handwriting with it is very beautiful + Aesthetics. One thing I would like to tell the seller is to send in boxed packages. Last time it was in a boxed package, this time it came in an opened plastic sheet, a bit dissapointing, the product could've gotten damaged in transit. But the product itself is Excellent. I hope more good japanese stationery are introduced to India, on Amazon.

title: 'Misleading Ad and expensive pencils'

title: 'Nice quality pencils.'
body: 'My takes a lot of notes. It has been very useful to her. Since she is not able to put 2B and HB refills in different pencils

column8: this is not a deal-breaker. Of course
column9: it would have made her happier if the built-in eraser had been of good quality too.'
